name: Christmas Valley
description:
Instructions
Welcome to the Christmas Vᴀʟʟᴇʏ! Collect coins to buy items from the shop. Make sure to watch out for dangers like spikes, Monsters, and saws! Enjoy :)
✦✦ How to play ✦✦
➜ Collect coins, use them to buy items in the shop
➜ [T] to chat, click the player on mobile.
➜ [N] to turn on/off names
➜ Jump, Shoot, or Attack at Monsters
➜Press Space to Attack or Shoot Press Z to Switch Weapon

There's a cheat! Find It hint you have to press a letter
